
━━━━━ NattyUI: ANSI Attributes ━━━━━

Some attributes are widely supported, such as bold, italic, underline, blink, in
vert and strike, while others are rarely complete or correctly implemented,  lik
e faint, double underline, curly underline, dotted underline, dashed underline, 
rapid_blink, framed, encircled, overlined and proportional. 
Alternative fonts are mostly completely ignored: primary_font, fraktur, font1, f
ont2, font3, font4, font5, font6, font7, font8, font9.
